text: Barneys New York is an American department store chain founded in 1923 by Barney Pressman. The company had full-line department stores in the United States from 1923 until 2020. As of 2024, Barneys continues its partnership with Saks Fifth Avenue and two branches work in New York City and Greenwich. ==References== Category:American department stores Category:1923 establishments in the United States
title: Barneys New York
